fullText: Despite a handsome physical production and the occasional rousing anthem, 'The Pirate Queen' never finds its sea legs, remaining stubbornly earthbound when it should soar.
dtliExcerpt: Despite a handsome physical production and the occasional rousing anthem, 'The Pirate Queen' never finds its sea legs, remaining stubbornly earthbound when it should soar.
